item.title: Telematics insurance
item.description: An overview of published and ongoing research papers within the telematics insurance research line developed in my lab. Unravelling the predictive power of telematics data in car insurance pricing Collaborators: Roel Verbelen, Katrien Antonio and Gerda Claeskens, research in the framework of the Ageas CE Research Chair. Journal paper: JRSS C, 67(5), 1275-1304 Working paper: Working paper on SSRN Abstract. A data set from a Belgian telematics product aimed at young drivers is used to identify how car insurance premiums can be designed based on the telematics data collected by a black box installed in the vehicle.
